Summary: POSSIBLE FLIGHT TEST OF TRIANGULE AIRPLANE
divs: Sighting DetailsLOCATION: APT BALCONY WITNESS: AIR VEHICLE WITH NO NOISE BUT BIG OBJECT FOR BEING LOW. COMMON VEHICLE IN AREA: SEEN MANY PLANES LANDING PATH TO ORLANDO INT AND PERSONAL ARIPLANE LANDING IN NEAR LAKE. VEHICLE IS NOT FAST ENOUGH FOR FLIGHT MOVEMENT TO LAND OR SMALL FOR NO NOISE. I HAVE OVER 24 YEARS OF MILITARY SERVICE, LOOK TO ME LIKE A FAST TRIANGLE BLIMP. WEATHER: LOW CLOUD AND STREET LIGHTS. OBJECT DID NOT TURN LIGHTS UNTIL OVER LAKE AND THEN TURN OFF ONCE ON SR-436. NO OBSERVIBLE NOICE BUT THE DID TURN OFF LIGHT ONCE THE TURN FROM MY DIRECTION AND TURN AWAY. MADE A 2ND PATH, 2220 LOCAL TIME, NO NOISE. BUT A SINGLE OR DOBLE PROPELLER AIRCRAFT PASS OVER IT (1,500 TO 2,000 FEET) AND WAS ABLE TO HEAR THE NOICE OF SECOND AIRCRAFT. I BELIVE IT WAS MAKING A TEST FLIGHT AROUND THE AREA.
